attributes.action: Lower cost of healthy food to combat obesity
attributes.background: I like so many others have suffered with excess weight and feel healthy food companies are making it difficult for low income families to afford to include healthy options into their budgets

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the prices which companies set for specific foods. You could start a petition calling on the Government to provide a healthy food subsidy in order to reduce the cost of healthy foods.
